subject: Question about password reset
body:
Hello TaskFlow Support Team,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm having a small issue with resetting my password and would appreciate your guidance.

I tried the 'Forgot Password' link but didn't receive the reset email. I've checked my spam folder as well.

Could you please help me with this? My account email is polite.customer@example.com.

Thank you for your assistance!

Best regards,
Sarah
